definition: the part played by a person in bringing about a result
details:
noun
- the part played by a person in bringing about a result
= example: the part played by a person in bringing about a result
= synonyms: part, share
- a writing for publication especially one of a collection of writings as an article or story
= example: a writing for publication especially one of a collection of writings as an article or story
- an amount of money contributed
= example: an amount of money contributed
- a voluntary gift , as of money or service or ideas, made to some worthwhile cause
= example: a voluntary gift , as of money or service or ideas, made to some worthwhile cause
= synonyms: donation
